DEATHKNIGHT_FROST: Use Power Infusion while Pillar of Frost is up, as well as Breath of Sindragosa or on cooldown if Pillar of Frost and Breath of Sindragosa are not talented
DEATHKNIGHT_UNHOLY: Use Power Infusion while Gargoyle is up, as well as Apocalypse or with Dark Transformation if Apocalypse or Gargoyle are not talented
DEMONHUNTER_HAVOC:
Use Power Infusion when:
• The Demon Hunter is in Metamorphosis form
• The encounter will end within 20 seconds
DRUID_BALANCE: Use Power Infusion when the Balance Druid's Celestial Alignment or Incarnation is active to synchronize with their major cooldown window.
EVOKER_DEVASTATION: Use Power Infusion when the Evoker has Dragonrage active or the fight will end in less than 35 seconds.
HUNTER_MARKSMANSHIP:
Use Power Infusion on the Marksmanship Hunter when:
Either their Trueshot buff has over 12 seconds remaining (to align with their burst window),
Or the fight will end in less than 13 seconds (to maximize final damage).
HUNTER_SURVIVAL: Power Infusion Usage for Survival Hunter: Use Power Infusion when the Hunter has Coordinated Assault active. If they do not have Coordinated Assault, activate it when their Spearhead is available. If the Hunter has neither talent, use Power Infusion on cooldown.
MAGE_ARCANE: Use Power Infusion on the Arcane Mage after they cast Arcane Surge if they do not have Spymaster's Web equipped, or after they cast Evocation if they have Spymaster's Web equipped.
MAGE_FIRE:
Use Power Infusion on the Fire Mage when:

  • They are about to activate Combustion (within the pre-cast window),
  • Their active Combustion has over 7 seconds remaining,
  • Or the encounter will end in less than 20 seconds.
MAGE_FROST: Cast Power Infusion on the Frost Mage if they do not already have the Power Infusion buff.
MONK_WINDWALKER: Use Power Infusion while Invoke Xuen, the White Tiger is active.
PALADIN_RETRIBUTION: Cast Power Infusion on the Retribution Paladin when they have Avenging Wrath active, or Crusade active, or if the target is affected by Execution Sentence.
PRIEST_SHADOW: Cast Power Infusion when any of the following are active: Voidform, Dark Ascension, or your The War Within Tier 2-Set bonus → and only when Power Infusion isn’t already active.
ROGUE_ASSASSINATION: Use Power Infusion when the target is affected by Deathmark.
ROGUE_SUBTLETY:
Power Infusion Usage for Subtlety Rogues

Cast Power Infusion on a Subtlety Rogue when they have Shadow Dance active, as this aligns with their burst window and maximizes the cooldown's effectiveness.
SHAMAN_ELEMENTAL: Cast Power Infusion when the Elemental Shaman has Ascendance active, or when Ascendance’s cooldown has more than 30 seconds remaining.
SHAMAN_ENHANCEMENT:
Use Power Infusion on the Enhancement Shaman when they have any of the following active:

  • Ascendance
  • Feral Spirit
  • Doom Winds
WARLOCK_AFFLICTION: Use Power Infusion on the Affliction Warlock when their major cooldowns are active to maximize damage output during high-impact phases.
WARLOCK_DEMONOLOGY: Cast Power Infusion when the Demonology Warlock has just used Hand of Gul'dan or Ruination, is summoning Demonic Tyrant, and their imps will despawn within 2 global cooldowns + Tyrant's cast time. Additionally, either their imps will despawn within 1 global cooldown + Tyrant's cast time or they have fewer than 2 Soul Shards.
WARLOCK_DESTRUCTION:
Use Power Infusion on a Destruction Warlock when:

  • Their Infernal is active,
  • They do not have the Summon Infernal talent,
  • The encounter will end before their next Infernal cooldown (with a 10-second buffer) and the fight duration exceeds Power Infusion's effect time,
  • Or the encounter ends before their Infernal cooldown resets (with a 15-second buffer).
WARRIOR_ARMS:
Cast Power Infusion when:

  • Colossus Smash is active on the target and the encounter will last at least 135 seconds
  • Target is in Execute Phase (below 20% health) and the Warrior has Avatar active
  • Encounter will end within 25 seconds
WARRIOR_FURY:
Use Power Infusion on the Fury Warrior under these conditions:

  • If Avatar has more than 15 seconds remaining AND the encounter will last at least 135 more seconds.
  • During Execute Phase (target below 20% health) while Avatar is active.
  • When the encounter will end in 25 seconds or less.
